name: document
description: Creates a PDF document from a text block containing CFML and HTML.

params.name: backgroundvisible
params.description: Specifies whether the background prints when the user prints the document

params.name: encryption
params.description: define if the output should be encrypted and how deep

params.name: filename
params.description: name for output file, if not defined output will be written to response stream

params.name: fontembed
params.description: define if fonts will embedded with the file

params.name: fontdirectory
params.description:
directory that contains additional font files (.ttf) and a pd4fonts.properties to describe them.

**Note**: Classic engine works using the font-family-name from pd4fonts.properties file. Modern (Flying saucer) engine works using the font-family-name from the .ttf file with the same case.

params.name: format
params.description: format of the created file

params.name: page
params.description: Specifies the page info in a struct like this {width:10, height:5, type:A4}

params.name: margin
params.description:
Specifies the margin in inches (default), centimeters or points. The attribute unit controls the type.
possible values is a number, so margin is the same all around, or a struct like this {top:1,bottom:1,left:2,right:2}

params.name: marginbottom
params.description:
Specifies the bottom margin in inches (default) or
centimeters. To specify bottom margin in
centimeters, include the unit=cm attribute.

params.name: marginleft
params.description:
Specifies the left margin in inches (default) or
centimeters. To specify left margin in centimeters,
include the unit=cm attribute.

params.name: marginright
params.description:
Specifies the right margin in inches (default) or
centimeters. To specify right margin in centimeters,
include the unit=cm attribute.

params.name: margintop
params.description:
Specifies the top margin in inches (default) or
centimeters. To specify top margin in centimeters,
include the unit=cm attribute.

params.name: mimetype
params.description: mimetype of the source (when attribute src or srcfile are defined)

params.name: name
params.description: name of a variable to store the output in it

params.name: orientation
params.description: Page orientation. Can be "landscape" or "portrait". Defaults to "portrait".

params.name: overwrite
params.description: define if an existing file will be overwritten or not

params.name: ownerpassword
params.description: Specifies an owner password (format="PDF" only).

params.name: pageheight
params.description: used when pagetype is custom

params.name: pagewidth
params.description: used when pagetype is custom

params.name: pagetype
params.description: defined the used format for the page (,legal,letter,A4,A5,B4,B5,B4-JIS,B5-JIS and custom)

params.name: permissions
params.description:
Sets the permissions for the document

- AllowPrinting
- AllowModifyContents
- AllowCopy
- AllowModifyAnnotations
- AllowFillIn
- AllowScreenReaders
- AllowAssembly
- AllowDegradedPrinting

params.name: scale
params.description: Define a scale factor as a percentage. This option is used to reduce the size of the HTML output so that it fits on that paper. Define a number less than 100.

params.name: src
params.description: define a url or a relative path on the local system to a file that should be transferred to a pdf

params.name: srcfile
params.description: define an absolute path to a file that should be transferred to a pdf

params.name: type
params.description:
Specifies which engine should be used to render the document.

Options are:

- classic
- modern (Available since PDF Extension version 1.0.0.92)
 
Defaults to the Application's `this.pdf.type` setting (which defaults to "modern").

params.name: unit
params.description: set the unit for pageheight, pagewidth, and margin...

params.name: userpassword
params.description: Specifies a user password (format="PDF" only). Defaults to "empty" if is not set, and encryption is set to 40 bit or 128 bit.

params.name: proxyhost
params.description: alias for proxyHost

params.name: proxyport
params.description:
The port number on the proxy server from which the object is requested. Default is 80. When
	used with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically
	resolved to preserve links in the retrieved document.

params.name: proxyuser
params.description: When required by a proxy server, a valid username.

params.name: proxypassword
params.description: When required by a proxy server, a valid password.

params.name: bookmark
params.description: Specifies whether bookmarks are created in the document

params.name: htmlbookmark
params.description:
If true, it is possible to convert outlines to a list of named anchors (`label`) or a headings structure (`

`...`

`). Transforming of HTML hyperlinks to PDF hyperlinks (if not explicitly disabled). Hyperlink jumps within the same document are supported as well

params.name: localurl
params.description: Specifies whether to retrieve image files directly from the local drive

params.name: authuser
params.description: User name sent to the target URL for Basic Authentication. Combined with password to form a base64 encoded string that is passed in the Authenticate header. Does not provide support for Integrated Windows, NTLM, or Kerberos authentication.

params.name: authpassword
params.description: Password sent to the target URL for Basic Authentication. Combined with username to form a base64 encoded string that is passed in the Authenticate header. Does not provide support for Integrated Windows, NTLM, or Kerberos authentication.

params.name: useragent
params.description: Text to put in the HTTP User-Agent request header field. Used to identify the request client software.

params.name: saveasname
params.description: (format="PDF" only) The filename that appears in the SaveAs dialog when a user saves a PDF file written to the browser.
